content: HLC-RC Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (rod coupling) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Anchor size is same as drill bit size for easy installation High performance in block, masonry and concrete base materials Applications Hanging rod applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Internally threaded Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated ### ITEMS- 336262 - Sleeve anchor HLC-RC 1/2 x 2-1/4 - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLC-RC 1/2X2 1/4 Sleeve anchor assy - 338108 - Sleeve anchor HLC-RC 1/2 x 2-1/4 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 200x HLC-RC 1/2X2 1/4 Sleeve anchor assy - 336254 - Sleeve anchor HLC-RC 3/8 x 1-7/8 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLC-RC 3/8X1 7/8 Sleeve anchor assy - 338100 - Sleeve anchor HLC-RC 3/8 x 1-7/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 400x HLC-RC 3/8X1 7/8 Sleeve anchor assy
